title: Getty Images
description: Build applications using the world's most powerful imagery

change_set_id.description: Contains the identifier for the change-set resource. Passed into ConfirmAssetChanges requests to confirm receipt of the asset changes in the response.

changed_assets.description: Contains a list of ChangedAssetList results for the query.

asset_changed_utc_datetime.description: Contains the date of the asset change.

asset_lifecycle.description: Contains the type of change this asset change is. (i.e. "New," "Updated" or "Deleted")

asset_type.description: Contains the type of asset this asset change is (i.e. "Image").

id.description: Contains the Id for the asset change.

uri.description: Contains the asset download URL for assets with an AssetLifecycle of "New."

how_can_i_use_it.description: Indicates how the asset can be used

usage_restrictions.description: Indicates asset usage restriction, if any

is_watermarked.description: Indicates whether the image is watermarked.

name.description: Identifies the name of the display size

uri.description: Identifies the URI for the image

aspect_ratio.description: Identifies the URI for the image

is_watermarked.description: Indicates whether the image is watermarked.

name.description: Identifies the name of the display size

uri.description: Identifies the URI for the image

asset_family.description: Specifies the asset family for the channel (e.g. "editorial" or "creative")

channel_id.description: Specifies the identification number for the channel

notification_count.description: Specifies the current count of notifications pending in the channel

RegisterAssetsRequest.description: Specify request containing the list of asset ids you want to register.

asset_ids.description: Specifies the list of asset ids you want to register.

RegisterAssetsRequest.title: RegisterAssetsRequest

asset_usage.description: Specifies the id, usage quantity, and date of when an asset was used.

asset_id.description: Specifies the Id of the asset that was used.

quantity.description: Specifies the number of times the asset was used.

usage_date.description: Identifies the date the asset was used, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD), time is not needed.

asset_usage.title: asset_usage

report_usage_batch_request.description: Specifies the request information for the Batch Usages endpoint.

asset_usages.description: Identifies the list of asset id, usage count and date of usage combinations to record.

report_usage_batch_request.title: report_usage_batch_request

report_usage_batch_response.description: Specifies the response from the Batch Usages endpoint.

invalid_assets.description: Identifies a list of asset ids submitted that did not match known Getty asset ids.

total_asset_usages_processed.description: Specifies the number of asset usage records that were successfully recorded.

report_usage_batch_response.title: report_usage_batch_response

actions.title: Artists_GetImagesByArtist
actions.description: ***BETA*** Search for images by a photographer

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

artist_name.description: Name of artist for desired images

fields.description: Comma separated list of fields. Allows restricting which fields are returned. If no fields are selected, the summary_set of fields are returned.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default page is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default page_size is 10, maximum page_size is 100.

actions.title: Artists_GetVideosByArtist
actions.description: ***BETA*** Search for videos by a photographer

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

artist_name.description: Name of artist for desired images

fields.description: Comma separated list of fields. Allows restricting which fields are returned. If no fields are selected, the summary_set of fields are returned.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default page is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default page_size is 10, maximum page_size is 100.

actions.title: AssetChanges_PutAssetChanges
actions.description: Generates asset changes.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

channel_id.description: Specifies the id of the channel for the asset data. Valid channel ids can be found in the results of the Get Partner Channel query.

batch_size.description: Specifies the number of assets to return. The default is 10; maximum is 500.

actions.title: AssetChanges_DeleteAssetChanges
actions.description: Confirm asset changes acknowledges receipt of asset changes.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

actions.title: AssetChanges_GetPartnerChannel
actions.description: Retrieves the channel data for the partner. This data can be used to populate the channel_id parameter in the Put Asset Changes query.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

actions.title: AssetRegistration_Register
actions.description: Register a list of customer assets.

actions.title: Boards_GetAllBoards
actions.description: ***BETA*** Get all boards that the user participates in

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

board_relationship.description: Search for boards the user owns or has been invited to as an editor.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1).

pageSize.description: Request number of boards to return in each page. (default is 30).

sort_order.description: Sort the list of boards by last update date or name. Defaults to date_last_updated_descending.

asset_ids.description: List the assets to be removed from the board.

actions.description: ***BETA*** Add an asset to a board

actions.description: ***BETA*** Add a comment to a board

actions.description: ***BETA*** Delete a comment from a board

actions.title: Collections_GetCollections
actions.description: Gets collections applicable for the customer.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

actions.title: Countries_GetCountries
actions.description: Gets countries codes and names.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

actions.title: Downloads_GetDownloads
actions.description: Returns information about a customer's downloaded assets.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

company_downloads.description: If specified, returns the list of previously downloaded images for all users in your company. Your account must be enabled for this functionality. Contact your Getty Images account rep for more information. Default is false.

end_date.description:
If specified, select assets downloaded on or before this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO
                8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.sss). If time is omitted, midnight is assumed. Date/times are UTC.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

product_type.description: Specifies product type to be included in the previous download results. To get previous iStockPhoto credit downloads, credit_pack must be selected.

start_date.description:
If specified, select assets downloaded on or after this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO
                8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.sss). If time is omitted, midnight is assumed. Date/times are UTC.

actions.title: Downloads_PostDownloads
actions.description:
The single step download call returns either a redirect or a response message with the URI to download the largest
                image available.
                Returns HTTP status code 303 Redirect to download URI or HTTP status code 200.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

auto_download.description:
<remarks>
                    Specifies whether to auto-download the image. If true is specified, a 303 SeeOther status is returned with a
                    Location header set to the location of the image.
                    If false is specified, the download URI will be returned in the response message.
                </remarks>

file_type.description:
<remarks>
                    File Type expressed with three character file extension.
                </remarks>

height.description:
<remarks>
                    Specifies the pixel height of the particular image to download.
                    Available heights can be found in the images/{ids} response for the specific image.
                    If left blank, it will return the largest available size.
                </remarks>

product_id.description:
<remarks>
                    Identifier of the instance for the selected product offering type.
                </remarks>

actions.title: Downloads_PostVideoDownloads
actions.description:
The single step download call returns either a redirect or a response message with the URI to download the largest
                video available.
                Returns HTTP status code 303 Redirect to download URI or HTTP status code 200.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

auto_download.description:
<remarks>
                    Specifies whether to auto-download the video. If true is specified, a 303 SeeOther status is returned with a
                    Location header set to the location of the video.
                    If false is specified, the download URI will be returned in the response message.
                </remarks>

product_id.description:
<remarks>
                    Identifier of the instance for the selected product offering type.
                </remarks>

size.description: Specifies the size to be downloaded.

actions.title: Events_GetBatch
actions.description: Returns an array of event metadata

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

fields.description: A comma separated list of fields to return in the response.

ids.description: A comma separated list of event ids.

actions.title: Events_Get
actions.description: Returns an array of event metadata

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

fields.description: A comma separated list of fields to return in the response.

actions.title: Images_GetBatch
actions.description: Get metadata for multiple images by supplying multiple image ids

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

ids.description: Specifies one or more image ids to return. Use comma delimiter when requesting multiple ids.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

actions.title: Images_Get
actions.description: Get metadata for a single image by supplying one image id

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

id.description: An image id. For more than one image please use the /v3/images endpoint.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

actions.title: Products_GetProducts
actions.description: Get Products

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

fields.description: Comma separated list of fields. Allows product download requirements to be returned.

actions.title: Purchases_GetPreviousAssetPurchases
actions.description: Get Previously Purchased Images and Video

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

end_date.description: If specified, retrieves previous purchases on or before this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 75, maximum page_size is 100.

start_date.description: If specified, retrieves previous purchases on or after this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

actions.title: Purchases_GetPreviousPurchases
actions.description: Get Previously Purchased Images

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

end_date.description: If specified, retrieves previous purchases on or before this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 75, maximum page_size is 100.

start_date.description: If specified, retrieves previous purchases on or after this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

actions.title: Search_GetEvents
actions.description: Search for events

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

date_from.description: Filters to events that start on or after this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31).

date_to.description: Filters to events that start on or before this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31).

editorial_segment.description: Filters to events with a matching editorial segment.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Default set is 'id','name','start_date'.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1, maximum is 50).

page_size.description: Request number of images to return in each page.

phrase.description: Filters to events related to this phrase

actions.title: Search_GetImagesByPhrase
actions.description: Search for both creative and editorial images

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Filter based on the age of individuals in an image.

artists.description: Search for images by specific artists (free-text, comma-separated list of artists).

collection_codes.description: Filter by collection codes (comma-separated list). Include or exclude based on collections_filter_type.

collections_filter_type.description: Provides searching based on specified collection(s).

color.description: Filter based on predominant color in an image. Use 6 character hexidecimal format (e.g., #002244). Note: when specified, results will not contain editorial images.

embed_content_only.description: Restrict search results to embeddable images. The default is false.

ethnicity.description: Filter search results based on the ethnicity of individuals in an image.

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

file_types.description: Return only images having a specific file type.

graphical_styles.description: Filter based on graphical style of the image.

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

minimum_size.description: Filter based on minimum size requested.

number_of_people.description: Filter based on the number of people in the image.

orientations.description: Return only images with selected aspect ratios.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1).

page_size.description: Request number of images to return in each page.

phrase.description: Search images using a search phrase.

prestige_content_only.description: Restrict search results to prestige images. The default is false.

product_types.description: Filter images to those having product types from the selected list.

specific_people.description: Return only images associated with specific people (using a comma-delimited list).

actions.title: Search_GetCreativeImagesByPhrase
actions.description: Search for creative images only

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Filter based on the age of individuals in an image.

artists.description: Search for images by specific artists (free-text, comma-separated list of artists).

collection_codes.description: Filter by collection codes (comma-separated list). Include or exclude based on collections_filter_type.

collections_filter_type.description: Use to include or exclude collections from search.

color.description: Filter based on predominant color in an image. Use 6 character hexidecimal format (e.g., #002244).

embed_content_only.description: Restrict search results to embeddable images. The default is false.

ethnicity.description: Filter search results based on the ethnicity of individuals in an image.

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

file_types.description: Return only images having a specific file type.

graphical_styles.description: Filter based on graphical style of the image.

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

minimum_size.description: Filter based on minimum size requested.

number_of_people.description: Filter based on the number of people in the image.

orientations.description: Return only images with selected aspect ratios.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1).

page_size.description: Request number of images to return in each page.

phrase.description: Search images using a search phrase.

prestige_content_only.description: Restrict search results to prestige images. The default is false.

product_types.description: Filter images to those having product types from the selected list.

actions.title: Search_GetEditorialImagesByPhrase
actions.description: Search for editorial images only

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Filter based on the age of individuals in an image.

artists.description: Search for images by specific artists (free-text, comma-separated list of artists).

collection_codes.description: Filter by collections (comma-separated list of collection codes). Include or exclude based on collections_filter_type.

collections_filter_type.description: Use to include or exclude collections from search.

editorial_segments.description: Return only events with a matching editorial segment.

embed_content_only.description: Restrict search results to embeddable images. The default is false.

end_date.description: Return only images that are created on or before this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31).

ethnicity.description: Filter search results based on the ethnicity of individuals in an image.

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

file_types.description: Return only images having a specific file type.

graphical_styles.description: Filter based on graphical style of the image.

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

minimum_quality_rank.description: Filter search results based on minimum quality ranking. Possible values 1, 2, 3 with 1 being best.

minimum_size.description: Filter based on minimum size requested.

number_of_people.description: Filter based on the number of people in the image.

orientations.description: Return only images with selected aspect ratios.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1).

page_size.description: Request number of images to return in each page.

phrase.description: Search images using a search phrase.

product_types.description: Filter images to those having product types from the selected list.

specific_people.description: Return only images associated with specific people (using a comma-delimited list).

start_date.description: Return only images that are created on or after this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31).

actions.title: Search_GetVideosByPhrase
actions.description: Search for both creative and editorial videos

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Provides filtering according to the age of individuals in a video.

collections_filter_type.description: Provides searching based on specified collection(s).

editorial_video_types.description: Allows filtering by types of video.

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

format_available.description: Filters according to the digital video format available on a film asset.

frame_rates.description: Provides filtering by video frame rate (frames/second).

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

product_types.description: Provides filtering by a list of product types.

specific_people.description: Provides filtering by specific peoples' names.

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

format_available.description: Filters according to the digital video format available on a film asset.

frame_rates.description: Provides filtering by video frame rate (frames/second).

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

product_types.description: Allows filtering by a list of product types.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

collections_filter_type.description: Provides searching based on specified collection(s).

editorial_video_types.description: Allows filtering by types of video.

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

format_available.description: Filters according to the digital video format available on a film asset.

frame_rates.description: Provides filtering by video frame rate (frames/second).

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

product_types.description: Allows filtering by a list of product types.

specific_people.description: Allows filtering by specific peoples' names.

actions.title: Usage_Put
actions.description: Report usage of assets via a batch format.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

id.description: Specifies a unique batch transaction id to identify the report.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

actions.title: Videos_Get

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.
